*** Variables ***
${COUNTER}         ${0}
${PASS MESSAGE}    Pass message
${FAIL MESSAGE}    Fail message
${FOR MESSAGE}     For message
${REMOVED WUKS MESSAGE}    Removed WUKS message
${KEPT WUKS MESSAGE}       Kept WUKS message


*** Test Case ***

Passing
    Log    ${PASS MESSAGE}

Failing
    Fail    ${FAIL MESSAGE}

For loop
    :FOR    ${num}    IN    one    two    three
    \    Log    ${FOR MESSAGE} ${num}
    Fail    Cannot pass

Wait until keyword succeeds when test fails
     Wait Until Keyword Succeeds    1s    0.01s    My Keyword
     Fail    Cannot pass

Wait until keyword succeeds when test passes
     Wait Until Keyword Succeeds    1s    0.01s    My Keyword

*** Keywords ***

My Keyword
    Set Test Variable    $COUNTER    ${COUNTER + 1}
    Run Keyword If    ${COUNTER} < 10    Fail    ${REMOVED WUKS MESSAGE}
    Run Keyword If    ${COUNTER} == 10    Fail    ${KEPT WUKS MESSAGE}
